overview: The False And Unpure Will Often Hide Behind A Thin Veil Of Geuinity, Deceiving Those Blinded By Their Own Fear Of Falseitivity And Using That Fear To Prosper In An Environment In Which They Do Not Belong. The Fear Blinded Deceived And The Deceivers Who Use Fear To Blind Are Both Visible To The Celestial, I Myself Am Neither Deceived Nor Deceiving.
title: You Held On Tight
